profile.title: Profile
profile.saveHelpful: Save posts you find helpful or inspiring

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.lowBalanceMessage: Your available balance is low. Keep engaging to earn more VOICE tokens!

premium.title: Premium Features
premium.description: Unlock premium features with $VOICE tokens. Monthly subscriptions auto-renew every 30 days.
premium.autoCancels: Cancels automatically if balance is low
premium.noRefund: Can be deactivated anytime without refund

languageSupport.title: Language Support
languageSupport.instant: Changes apply immediately across the app
languageSupport.rtl: Future RTL language support coming soon
languageSupport.fallback: Missing translations fall back to English

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our top priority
privacy.noTrackingDesc: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or any third-party tracking services. Your activity stays private.
privacy.noCookiesDesc: We never set cookies. All data stays on your device using encrypted localStorage.
privacy.secureNetworkDesc: All requests are validated against an allowlist. Only trusted domains are permitted.
privacy.localDataDesc: Your data never leaves your device. Posts, preferences, and wallet info stay local and encrypted.
privacy.web3NoticeDesc: Connecting a wallet exposes your blockchain address. Your Student ID stays anonymous.
privacy.commitment: We are committed to protecting your privacy and staying transparent about our practices.
privacy.opensource: SafeVoice is open source. Audit our code any time.

fingerprint.title: Browser Fingerprint Protection
fingerprint.description: Monitor and protect against browser fingerprinting techniques used by trackers to identify you across websites.
fingerprint.detectionDesc: Monitor browser fingerprinting signals and track your privacy risk score.
fingerprint.mitigationDesc: Automatically apply countermeasures when high-risk fingerprinting is detected.
fingerprint.saltRotationDesc: Rotate the anonymization salt to refresh your fingerprint signature.

crisis.thankYou: Thank you for reaching out ðŸ’™

feed.title: Feed
feed.beFirst: Be the first to share something!

zkProof.title: Privacy Protection
zkProof.description: Generating cryptographic proof to protect your identity
zkProof.verifiedMessage: Your identity is cryptographically verified and protected

hero.title: Your Privacy, Our Priority
hero.subtitle: SafeVoice is built from the ground up for privacy. Learn how we protect your identity and data, and how you can maximize your privacy with our tools.

features.anonymousDesc: No real name, email, or phone number needed
features.encryptedDesc: AES-256 encryption for your local data

features.title: Privacy Features
features.subtitle: Built-in protections that keep you anonymous by default
features.encryptionDesc: Your data is encrypted locally before storage
features.analyticsDesc: No tracking scripts, no user profiling

dataFlow.title: How Your Data Flows
dataFlow.subtitle: Your data journey from creation to storage

steps.youDesc: Your device - where all data starts
steps.noServerDesc: Data stays on your device by default

dataFlow.defaultContent: Data encrypted locally, Stored on your device, No transmission anywhere, Maximum privacy
dataFlow.optionalContent: Backup to IPFS network, Decentralized storage, No identity link, Still anonymous

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.tip: Tip: Use the search bar to find answers to specific questions, or browse by category to learn about a particular privacy topic.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your Privacy?
cta.subtitle: Take the next step with SafeVoice. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your privacy, we have options for every comfort level.
cta.contributeDesc: Share your thoughts anonymously with the community
cta.customizeDesc: Fine-tune your privacy settings and protections
